t: Amazon.com : PG Tips 240 Original Non-Pyramid Tea Bags (Pack of 1) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I’ve been drinking PG tips tea since the 70s when I used to live in England. I steep the bag in boiled water for 3-5 minutes, usually 5 minutes because I like strong tea. The taste is robust and smooth and the size of the bag is perfect for one serving. Caffeine content is less than coffee, I use about 6-10 tea bags during the day, doesn’t make me jittery or hyper. It can be used to make iced tea but I’d rather use some other cheaper brand...
